fields.title: Campaign Category

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
DecentGigs stands out with its unique approach by bringing forward a global decentralized job marketplace that partially solves the real world problems previously ignored by funded projects. It merges subject less identity verification, on chain payments, and privacy-first communication to get rid of the fraud and trust problems that are found in the Web2 job platforms.

DecentGigs is available to all, including Cardano and non Cardano users, while its community driven design allows for growth that is both organic and transparent. Thus, it is the first effective solution that links through a secure and functional channel the global talent with the Cardano ecosystem directly.

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
The DecentGigs MVP will exhibit the main features that certify the platform's real-life application and its sustainability for a wider market:

1. Atala PRISM DID-Based Identity Verification (KYC): Showcases through decentralized identity verification the privacy violation-free interactions of workers and employers.
2. Funds Locked Until Job Completion: An escrow system based on smart contracts that ensures the safety of money holding until the agreement of both parties that the job is done.
3. Automated Payouts: The payment is released automatically by the system once the job is confirmed, thus eliminating the need for any third party intermediaries.
4. Off chain Work Verification: The proofs of work (files, documents, or activities) can be verified outside the chain, and the results can be recorded on the chain for transparency and integrity.
5. On chain Talent Score: A reputation system that is transparent and could not be altered is stored on-chain to avoid manipulation and provide reliable evaluations.
6. Peer to Peer (P2P) Chat: Directly encrypted messaging between peers that workers and employers use to talk without depending on centralized servers.
7. Admin Chat for Support & Mediation: A specific communication channel that allows administrators to assist, mediate disputes, and fix issues.

**The MVP will be available through:**

DecentGigs Web Application (Web App)

[https://decentralize\-market\-place\.vercel\.app/](https://decentralize-market-place.vercel.app/)

GitHub Repository

[https://github\.com/Surabaya\-Blockchain\-Alliance/DecentGigs](https://github.com/Surabaya-Blockchain-Alliance/DecentGigs)

sub_fields.title: Describe realistic measures of success, ideally with on-chain metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
**These metrics will be measurable after the MVP goes live:**

1. 200 of Cardano Wallet
2. 50 of Job Completion occurred
3. 50 of manual off chain work verified
4. 150 of verifier user
5. 100 of freelance/employee applied
6. 50 of Employer promote the job

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
We acknowledge that our Indonesian ecosystem readiness divides into 2, the first is that human resources have a language barrier for professional work and the second is the professionals without a platform to be recognized beside grants and funding mechanisms. This platform is unique compared to traditional and recent web 2 platforms as the existing web 2 often reflect less transparent and high middleman cost as an outsource agent.

Our proposed solution for building Decent Gigs a real wolrd addoption marketplace for Gigs worker and Employer who need to connect with trust less but still verifiable via Atala Prism, use also Cardano as On top blockchain stack, and implement USDM as eosystem token payment.

Verify jobs, experience gigs and fund release handle as onchain with force employer to depositing their fund to escrow contracts which is guarante that the employeer is needed that jobs to be done, and the bidder winner received only when their jobs is in proofable and accepted by the employer via signer.

Implementation of USDM token payment for more rich ecosystem for USDM token. wether have Peer to Peers chat auto setup using mesh sdk and signer as autenticate and peers handler, lower fee and fully decentralized by design.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
_In an effort to speed up the expansion of the Cardano ecosystem, we introduce a plan to create a job search platform based on Cardano\. This platform's main goal is to link talented people from all over the world to different projects in the Cardano ecosystem, thus bringing up the adoption, utility, and on\-chain activity as well\._

The following are the positive effects this platform will have on Cardano:

1. Professional sector using the Cardano blockchain more will lead the user base of the Cardano blockchain to grow.
2. The linking of global talent to projects in the Cardano ecosystem, which includes startups, dApps, and decentralized organizations (DAOs), will be facilitated.
3. The finding of skilled workers by companies and communities will be easier which, in turn, will lead to the accelerated growth of the ecosystem.
4. The ADA token will be given more importance, as payment methods, identity verification, and work contracts will all be conducted through Cardano smart contracts.
5. Jobs will be created, thereby facilitating the entry of the Cardano blockchain into non-crypto audiences like freelancers, developers, designers, marketers, and other professionals.

Key results that are shareable to the community:

1. Cardano Forum: progress report each milestone challenges and problem solving.
2. Present fully functional platform to other jobseeker platform for potential partnership
3. Present fully functional platform to local community institutions
4. Forwarding the custom email marketing to Cardano ecosystem abroad starting from

South east asia region

- Asia region
- Africa region
- Europe region and western hemisphere



5. Introduce the platform to be the gateway for work abroad can enable the partnership with education agency

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
**_Applicant’s Track Record:_**

Our team has robust skills in Web3 app creation, digital identity merging, and community powered platform creating. Our history in the Cardano Indonesia ecosystem, together with technical know-how in system design and project management, gives us a firm ground to execute this project with great levels of trust and accountability.

Every development activity will be done in a transparent manner through constant updates, full documentation, and open-source code on GitHub. With our combined power and participation of Tutut Indah and friends, we agreed to have an agreement and compiled our ideas beneath the Cardano Hub Indonesia and a perspective of financial feasibility from Fanny Wijaya as Cardano Ambassador Indonesia.

The Financial Viability will engage a sustained revenue model of ROI, capital required from business owners rather than workforce to add more cost just to get a job. Fanny Wijaya has engaged several times meeting with Tutut in the arena of Cardano Woman Indonesia, achieving standards of Woman Empowerment in Indonesia and agreed to proceed with the initiatives. The insight was: Ambassadors often present projects to come to their monthly meeting, foresee the potential project that is suitable for the community. In 2 months, this proposal was successfully made.

Transparency and financial feasibility will be added to the milestone as an output and milestone based, to ensure that our approach here is monitored:

1. Development of a usable MVP for conducting tests on main flows like identity verification, job posting, on-chain escrow, and job completion.
2. Community testing through a testnet and early-access onboarding of Cardano Hub Indonesia and global ecosystem participants.
3. Technical evaluation of Atala Prism DID integration and the reliability of on-chain/off-chain procedures prior to the mainnet launch.
4. Market confirmation by measuring user interest, collecting usability feedback, and defining real-world feature requirements from both professional and non-cryptocurrency user segments.

Moreover, transparency and financial viability will be part of the milestone-based outputs, which will ensure that every milestone will provide a comprehensive report on fund utilization, verified technical progress, and cost-effectiveness assessment. This framework guarantees the entire project timeline will have continuous monitoring and accountability.

**Past achievement with core team of Cardano Hub Indonesia:**

1. Cardano Hub Surabaya and
2. Cardano Workshop Jakarta Fund10,
3. Cardano Hub Indonesia: Marketing Initiatives Fund 13

**Technical validation for future feasibility of this project:**

WEB:

[https://decentralize\-market\-place\.vercel\.app/](https://decentralize-market-place.vercel.app/**)

Repository:

 **[https://github\.com/Surabaya\-Blockchain\-Alliance/DecentGigs](https://github.com/Surabaya-Blockchain-Alliance/DecentGigs)**



Draft Legal 

[https://github\.com/Tututindah/Decentralize\-Market\-Place/tree/main/LEGAL](https://github.com/Tututindah/Decentralize-Market-Place/tree/main/LEGAL)



utility and feature: 

[https://raw\.githubusercontent\.com/Surabaya\-Blockchain\-Alliance/p2p\-Chat/refs/heads/main/assets/image\.jfif](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Surabaya-Blockchain-Alliance/p2p-Chat/refs/heads/main/assets/image.jfif)

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
**Milestone 1: Research & Legal \(Months 1\-2\)**

Total: ₳30,000

1. **Research & Design \(₳19,000\):** Market analysis, UI/UX simplification, MVP wireframing, and technical documentation.
2. **Legal & Regulatory \(₳7,500\):** Legal consultations to ensure compliance with digital contracts, user agreements, and data privacy regulations.
3. **Management & Operations \(₳3,500\):** Team recruitment, research coordination, community planning documentation, and operational setup.

**Milestone 2: Core Development \(Months 3\-7\)**

Total: ₳40,000

1. **Core Development \(₳30,000\):** Backend/frontend development, Cardano wallet integration, escrow smart contracts, and blockchain-based reputation system.
2. **Marketing & User Adoption \(₳7,000\):** Company collaboration events (min. 1 company + 10 job seekers), KOL outreach, and partnership campaigns.
3. **Management & Operations \(₳3,000\):** Coordinating the project, tracking its progress, managing internal documents and making sure that the team is aligned in the activities of development, research and community work across the board.

**Milestone 3: Beta Launch & Testing \(Months 8\-10\)**

Total: ₳25,000

1. **Beta Testing \(₳15,000\):** Security audits, user testing (20+ testers), bug fixes, and feedback implementation.
2. **Marketing &  User Adoption \(₳7,000\):** Global partnerships (min. 5 entities), beta-test campaigns, and pre-launch awareness.
3. **Management & Operations \(₳3,000\):** Testing coordination, partnership management, and performance evaluation.

**Milestone 4: Public Launch & Close\-Out \(Months 11\-12\)**

Total: ₳25,000

1. **Marketing &  User Adoption \(₳20,000\):** Public launch campaigns (AMAs, testimonial videos), Cardano collaborations (Intersect/Ambassadors), and social media blitz.
2. **Management & Operations \(₳5,000\):** Platform deployment, user data tracking, final project reporting (GitHub/docs/videos), and Catalyst recommendations.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
**Our Proposed Works and Proposed Resources above will represent value for money for the Cardano ecosystem widely for:**

1. Ecosystem Growth: Onboarding new users to the Cardano ecosystem through practical utility.
2. Token Utility: Increasing ADA and USDM usage through job payments and escrow contracts
3. Community Development: Creating employment opportunities within the Cardano community abroad and locally.
4. Sustainable Revenue Model: Establishing a self-sustaining platform with clear ROI potential for future development.
5. Open Source Contribution: Adding valuable open-source code to the Cardano development ecosystem
6. Limited Partnership: adding web 2 traditional marketplace to cooperate with stages and future agreement.
7. Global Reach: Expanding Cardano's presence in employment markets worldwide especially in Indonesia’s region.
8. Technical Innovation: implementation real-world blockchain application for identity verification and secure payments
